Yeah, that got moved to Maw of Malmortius. But _now?_ Rageblade gives double the attack speed (largest bonus from a single item, after the Hurricane changes), stacks twice as fast on melees, and gives +3 AD per stack, too. On top of the AoE magic damage at full stacks. People are unlikely to think they can duel you when everything around you starts exploding. On the other hand, people are unlikely to be able to duel you. So there's that. Also helps with waveclear/pushing. If you still want that "berserker rage" effect, you can get Maw, too. But Rageblade seems like a really strong first item for melee champs with on-hits and mixed scaling (Irelia, Jax, Yi).
i never did like Maw of Malmortius if a person doing magic damage is a threat they are most likely doing far more damge than the sheild can even make a noticable dent in

That's not really true. The live version is a 400-point shield plus 40 MR. It can easily add over 1k effective health against magic damage. The new one gives 55 AD, 50 magic resist and 10 armor penetration, and the shield scales with bonus MR. And if you take ANY magic damage while you're low (say, from Corki), you get the bonus attack speed, lifesteal, and spellvamp. I think it's a nice way to itemize against magic damage without sacrificing too much AD. The shield may not be as good as a few hundred actual health, but Spirit Visage doesn't come with AD, arpen, or lifesteal.
